ability.name: The Sun
ability.description: * Move to any position on the map. * Deal 2 melee damage. * Give a player in the same zone 2 shields. * Flip any face-down card on the table, including the top card of any player's deck. Everyone can play with that card visible. * Choose a player: they may draw an extra card. * Choose an Adversary in the same Zone: they cannot move this turn.
